full_summary:
===============

W6895-230103 - Request for Standing Offer: Canopy Cleaning  
----------------------------------------------------------------

### Tender Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified suppliers to submit a standing offer for the provision of canopy cleaning services at the Department of National Defence (DND) facilities in Cold Lake, Alberta. The services include cleaning of kitchen exhaust canopies, ductwork, exhaust fans, filters, and associated canopy components and hoods.

### Key Details

*   Tender Reference: WS4495752807
*   Solicitation Number: WS4495752807
*   Publication Date: May 16, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date: July 5, 2024, at 14:00 EDT
*   Expected Contract Start Date: July 15, 2024
*   Expected Contract End Date: July 14, 2027

### Tender Requirements

The tender requires the supplier to provide all necessary labour, materials, tools, equipment, transportation, and supervision for the canopy cleaning services. The supplier must also attend a mandatory site visit on June 10, 2024, at 4 Wing Cold Lake.

### Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Contracting Entity

The contracting entity is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

### End User Entity

The end user entity is the Department of National Defence (DND).

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Matthew Keenan at matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Tender Notice

For detailed information on the tender, please visit the Ariba Discovery website at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19725722?extsite=MTk3MjU3MjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19725722?extsite=MTk3MjU3MjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).  
=====================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================================
